description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  Instead of calcifying large amounts of calcified teeth, it has instead calcified a single large blade-like mass; which it uses defensively and offensively.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.
Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.
